Author: Det
Name: Target Furniture
Punchline: Adds an option that let you Select/Move an housing item from the Housing Menu
Description:
Currently, the only possible way to select an housing item is to click it manually with your mouse over it, and that can be a problem if you have multiple items close to each other. 
This plugins adds a new option when you right click an item from the housing menu saving you a lot of prouble.
